icesTAFDB
=======

icesTAFDB Functions to support the creation of ICES Fisheries Overviews, ....

icesTAFDB is implemented as an [R](https://www.r-project.org) package 
<!-- and available on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=icesTAFDB). -->
and available on GitHub 

Installation
------------

icesTAFDB can be installed from GitHub using the `install_github` command from the
`remotes` package:

```R
library(remotes)
install_github("ices-tools-prod/icesTAFDB")
```

Usage
-----

For a summary of the package:

```R
library(icesTAFDB)
?icesTAFDB
```

Examples
--------

## Download a list of public TAF assessments

To get a list of all the publicly available assessments on TAF use the function `taf_assessments()`

```{r}
public_taf <- taf_assessments()
# show a subset
kable(head(public_taf)[c(1,10,17,20,22,9)])
```

if you want to get the list of assessments / analyses available for a particular stock in a given year, use

```{r}
rjm2015 <- taf_assessments(year = 2015, stock = "rjm-347d")
# show a subset
kable(head(rjm2015)[c(1,10,17,20,22,9)])
```
